field.label: CPU
field.help: Read metrics about CPU usage.

field.label: Per-CPU
field.help: Whether to report Per-CPU stats or not.

field.label: Total CPU
field.help: Whether to report total system CPU stats or not.

field.label: Collect CPU Time
field.help: If true, collect raw CPU time metrics.

field.label: Disk
field.help: Read metrics about disk usage by mount point.

field.label: Disk Mount Points
field.help: By default, Telegraf gather stats for all mountpoints. Setting mountpoints will restrict the stats to the specified mountpoints.

field.label: Disk Ignore FS
field.help: Ignore some mountpoints by filesystem type. For example (dev)tmpfs (usually present on /run, /var/run, /dev/shm or /dev).

field.label: Disk IO
field.help: Read metrics about disk IO by device.

field.label: Memory
field.help: Read metrics about memory usage.

field.label: Processes
field.help: Get the number of processes and group them by status.

field.label: Swap
field.help: Read metrics about swap memory usage.

field.label: System
field.help: Read metrics about system load and uptime.

field.label: Network
field.help: Read network interface metrics.

field.label: PF
field.help: Read PF values via pfctl.

field.label: Ping (IPv4)
field.help: Ping Hosts using IPv4 and measure the metrics.

field.label: Ping Hosts (IPv4)
field.help: Set the Hosts to ping using IPv4 in a CSV list.

field.label: Ping (IPv6)
field.help: Ping Hosts using IPv6 and measure the metrics.

field.label: Ping Hosts (IPv6)
field.help: Set the Hosts to ping using IPv6 in a CSV list.

field.label: HAProxy
field.help: Enable the collection of HAProxy statistics.

field.label: ZFS
field.help: Enable the collection of ZFS statistics.

field.label: NTPQ
field.help: Enable the collection of NTP query metrics.

field.label: NTPQ DNS Lookup
field.help: Can increase metric gather times.
